title: Domino Disc lowwww grade Cardinals Evans

posts.post_title: Domino Disc lowwww grade Cardinals Evans
posts.post_content:
Last one of these low grade beauties. Other one sold fast. This one has the rim but face is scratched and name below rim. Still a fun Type piece

14 shipped. Pm to reserve. Pp gift.  Thx Scott
I will give ya a little surprise with this too. Vintage is king, even in lower grade🤠
